last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 44
last_episode_to_air.overview: Miguel asks Epigmenio about the audio recording. The framing of Edna brings unexpected consequences. Dora reveals a long-held secret to Miguel.

name: El Dragón: Return of a Warrior
original_name: El Dragón: El regreso de un guerrero
overview: A Tokyo business man returns to his home country of Mexico where he must battle rivals to replace his grandfather as the head of a cartel.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: To replace his grandfather as head of a cartel, a Tokyo financier returns to his home country of Mexico, where he must battle two rivals for control.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: A bombing investigation gives Héctor a lead on his sister's murder. As Miguel plans to produce a new drug, Valentín uses Chisca to steal the prototype.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: An attempt to overthrow the head of a transport cartel brings Tokyo financier Miguel back to his Mexican hometown. A nightclub celebration turns tragic.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Lamberto calls an urgent meeting of his cartel's regional leaders, including Epigmenio. A funeral reunites two old friends. Asya receives grave news.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Miguel moves back to Ciudad Jiménez, where a near accident introduces him to a new friend. Chisca indulges in a risky lifestyle to forget a past trauma.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: On the golf green, Miguel offers Carlos Duarte a proposal, and later travels to Miami to set up a shell company and find a frontman for it.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After Miguel returns to Mexico City, Epigmenio orders Tacho to kill him. Lamberto learns a terrible truth related to the death of his son 16 years ago.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: An evening at a pub takes a sudden turn for Miguel and Adela, leading to a big shake-up within El Salado and a change of residence for the Garzas.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Epigmenio starts forging new alliances. Chisca makes life difficult for Adela. Karina finds herself being hunted by one of her Russian mafia contacts.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Miguel sets out to eliminate a threat to his plans: Sergei. While interviewing Natalia's parents, Héctor finds a lead. Chisca learns how to use spyware.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Miguel tries to eliminate those bidding on the Grace prototype. Jorge starts working with Kenia and Flaco. Chisca plans her revenge against Valentín.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Miguel sets a contingency plan in motion to try to save Peligros's life and salvage the auction scheme. In Madrid, Chisca reconnects with Valentín.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Héctor and Claudia examine the locker's contents. Jaramillo tortures Miguel to learn who he works for. Chisca finds a way to lure Valentín to Mexico.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Epigmenio gets revenge against Enano. In Colombia, Miguel struggles to escape from the gunmen chasing him. Adela helps Jorge choose a gift for Kenia.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Chisca launches a plan to kill Valentín, but an unexpected turn of events gives her second thoughts. Jimena makes her feelings for Miguel known to him.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Héctor gets Natalia's laptop decrypted by Flaco. Miguel takes Adela to Miami for an industry party. Valentín encourages Chisca to misbehave.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: When an emergency arises, Jorge sees Valentín's true colors. Howard taps the phone of Ecogreen's frontman. Adela's driving skills are put to the test.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Vladimir seeks revenge against his daughter's abductors. Héctor interviews Natalia's former co-worker. The Pacheco brothers get special instructions.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: During his meeting with the Pacheco brothers, Miguel receives a secret plea for help. Jimena finds herself in a forced meeting with Epigmenio.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The Pacheco brothers storm the ranch in Ciudad Jiménez. Adela sees a colder side of Miguel. Héctor visits the man who's in prison for killing Natalia.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Miguel leads an operation to rescue Dora. Kenia is tasked with distracting Jorge to keep him from finding out the bad news. The car bomb awaits Héctor.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Jorge learns why Kenia invited him to her home. Miguel makes a decision that upsets Jimena. A phone tip leads Dora to ask Peligros for a big favor.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Adela gives a speech at the foundation's launch party. Héctor travels to Ciudad Jiménez to interview the owner of the nightclub where his sister died.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Tadamichi sends Miguel to broker a drug deal with the Serbian mob, but Epigmenio finds out about it and decides to interfere. Adela meets a new man.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Miguel launches an all-out effort to find the stolen drugs. Jimena makes a surprising offer to Chisca. Héctor gets into a tricky situation with Juana.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: With Peligros's help, Miguel arranges a distraction so a delicate swap can be made. Adela and Víctor go on a date. Héctor finds a clue on Juana's phone.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: After his men are ambushed by Halcón's, Epigmenio seeks help from Duarte. Stock market activity spurs IRS agent Howard to pay a visit to Ecogreen's CEO.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Jimena meets with Hans Pritken at his pharmaceutical lab and snoops around. Víctor makes a grand gesture toward Adela. Héctor publishes an exposé.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Chisca's latest stunt forces Miguel to send her to rehab. A member of El Salado shows his true colors. The hackers devise a plan to break into the lab.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Jimena's arrival at the lab with Pritken complicates the team's departure. Miguel overhears Víctor in a suspicious phone conversation.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Miguel sets out to poach Alí Farchala while keeping him safe from Pritken. Jimena uses Chisca to win Miguel's favor. Ángel and Chisca try something new.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Miguel grows suspicious of Coyote. A trip to their hometown brings Adela and Miguel closer together. Ángel retaliates against Chisca for her infidelity.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Héctor's wife returns home at the worst possible moment. Miguel wrestles with his fear of falling in love. Ángel's video comes to the Garzas' attention.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Chisca introduces herself to Valentín's wife. Claudia warns Ana that Héctor is writing a dangerous article. Jorge asks Kenia to be his first.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Miguel's reaction to the magazine article leads Adela to a decision. Epigmenio is betrayed by one of his own. Valentín gives Chisca an assignment.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Héctor publishes an article revealing what Chano told him. Duarte learns the IRS is investigating Miguel. Adela confronts the loiterer she keeps seeing.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Adela shares with Dora what Gato confessed to her. Zaragoza sees proof that Coyote is a traitor. Miguel tries to broker a truce between Jun and Goro.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: Miguel races to save Tadamichi from the trap he's walked into. Valentín receives intel from Chisca. A new resident comes to live at the Garza home.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: Miguel proposes a deal to Epigmenio. Héctor's use of an ATM reveals his whereabouts. Dora makes the mistake of using a landline to call Zaragoza.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Ana calls Miguel to help find Héctor. Miguel receives a summons from the attorney general. Duarte realizes he must get rid of a liability: Miguel.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: To replace his grandfather as head of a cartel, a Tokyo financier returns to his home country of Mexico, where he must battle two rivals for control.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the chaotic aftermath of the explosion, one life hangs in the balance while another is lost. Ishiro tries to keep Chisca on the straight and narrow.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The attorney general investigates the courier who delivered the bomb. Dora takes action to keep secret the person behind the murder of Miguel's parents.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Héctor tracks down the ballistics results in his sister's case. Chisca hacks into Valentín's laptop camera. Miguel tests the drug Efilina on himself.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ishiro is tasked with stealing Adri's and her dad's phones and deleting their incriminating text messages. Miguel learns who supplied Chisca with drugs.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After learning about the attorney general's new evidence, Epigmenio demands a sacrifice from Tacho. Jimena takes steps to win back Miguel's trust.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: IRS agent Howard Toledo hires a hacker to break into Naga Company's IT network. Miguel travels to Miami, where an actress asks him for help.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Naga Company leaks Sunny Productions' new films. The attorney general shares her intel with Howard. Miguel goes to Spain to negotiate two partnerships.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Miguel visits a Seville winery that would be perfect for storing ephiline, but must convince the owner to sell. Adela encounters a battered woman.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Chisca agrees to steal the ephiline from Miguel's room, but must first get past Ishiro. Miguel's negotiations with María Terry take an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Pharmaceutical mogul Hans Pritken learns his lab scientist Ali is alive and well. Valentín decides it's time to eliminate his main obstacle: Ishiro.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Miguel tries a new strategy with María Terry. Héctor uses his newfound info on Braulio's wife to get the prisoner to reconsider his stay behind bars.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: When Chisca calls Valentín with her good news, he and Piero launch a plan to escape from Spain with the prototype. Braulio asks Epigmenio for a favor.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Epigmenio gives Lobo his next mission. Kenia receives a message that rattles her nerves. Miguel surprises Adela with a specially planned evening.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: While visiting her husband's grave, Dora makes a vow. Braulio's cellmate fulfills his promise. Kenia takes harsh measures in order to protect Jorge.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: As the victim of the drive-by shooting fights to survive, Duarte faces backlash from the press. Dora visits Tacho in prison and offers him a deal.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Dora's hitmen follow Lobo to a safehouse where Epigmenio is hiding. When Braulio awakens, Ishiro and Peligros must extract him from the prison hospital.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Jimena meets with Guido to learn about his app. Miguel takes Adela to Nepal, where ephiline production is underway. Weeks later, the drug is released.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Héctor orders his doctor to tell him the truth. Peligros finds out Epigmenio is alive and well. Kenia is forced to defend herself against Christian.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Tensions run high as Miguel's guests arrive on the island and are subjected to security protocols. Kenia takes a risk to fulfill her end of a bargain.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Kenia tries to get rid of the tracker in a place where it won't be found. Epigmenio makes a claim that shocks Miguel, and later seeks an ally.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Kenia comes clean to Jorge. Hoping to find out who killed Miguel's parents, Adela goes undercover in order to befriend Epigmenio's wife.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Ecogreen's frontman Leopoldo balks when Jimena presents him with new documents to sign. Adela tries to explain to Carmen why she left so suddenly.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Howard sends Leopoldo on a mission to steal from Jimena the documents proving Ecogreen is buying Pídenos. Duarte faces competition for the presidency.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Miguel tasks his team with finding a way to recover the oil lost in the spill. Forced by his wife, Héctor returns to work. Dora pays a secret visit.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Tacho plots his escape from prison and sets his plan in motion. Someone accidentally discovers Lobo and Carmen's affair — and gets proof on video.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Tacho confronts Epigmenio. Howard's hacker manages to infiltrate Naga Company's IT network. Adela gets Carmen to open up about Miguel's parents.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Miguel arrives in Miami, where Howard sends out his lure to trap him. Adela is shocked when she sees Carmen. Ishiro hosts a special evening for Chisca.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Tacho enlists his parents to gather intel on Miguel's recent operations in Mexico. Suspicious of Kenia, Jorge decides to tail her.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Adela carefully considers the proposal she's been offered. The attorney general receives a tip about an incoming shipment of ephiline.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Howard threatens Karina Grishenko with prison time to get her to lead Miguel into a trap. Jorge asks Flaco to investigate the man he photographed.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Adela must find a way to delete the photo of her on Carmen's phone before Epigmenio meets with his wife. Ishiro embarks on his next mission.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: A judge grants Edna a brief window of opportunity to collect evidence against Miguel. When Howard learns Adela is in Miami, he targets her next.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Carmen sets a trap and Adela takes the bait. Hans Pritken forces Jimena to summon the ephiline lab's new head. Duarte's secretary gives Héctor a lead.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: When Duarte starts a rumor that could destroy Miguel's drug business, Héctor fights back by publishing the photograph he secretly took.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Miguel's scientists race to determine the victims' exact cause of death. Kenia tries to break into the computer Flaco set up to store top-secret data.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: Flaco follows Kenia. A reward for info on Epigmenio's whereabouts tempts one of Jaramillo's men. Edna overhears a horrifying phone conversation.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: As Kenia runs for her life, Adela begs Miguel to spare her. A halt in ephiline production spurs Miguel's partners to take matters into their own hands.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Jorge recovers his suppressed memory. Héctor helps Edna find Braulio so he can testify against Duarte. Miguel's associates decide to replace him.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: Jorge demands to speak to Epigmenio. Duarte's secretary's testimony opens a forensic investigation to determine Natalia's true cause and place of death.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: Seeing the aftermath of the ambush, Jorge goes after Epigmenio. Duarte desperately seeks help to escape the country. Jimena makes her exit.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: A month later, a revenge plan unfolds to destroy the business partners who betrayed Miguel, including Piero, Kuang, Drenka and the Russian mafia.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: Miguel enlists Héctor to help frame the Valley Organization for the recent murders of the drug bosses, and to tell Edna where Epigmenio has been hiding.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Gary tracks down the car that followed him to Kenia's safe house. Carmen calls Adela and asks to meet. Miguel notices an oddity in the audio recording.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: Miguel asks Epigmenio about the audio recording. The framing of Edna brings unexpected consequences. Dora reveals a long-held secret to Miguel.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: A bombing investigation gives Héctor a lead on his sister's murder. As Miguel plans to produce a new drug, Valentín uses Chisca to steal the prototype.
